examples.example: 我的甜心宝贝每天都能给我带来无尽的快乐。

translate.english: My sweet heart baby can bring me endless joy every day.

examples.example: 我的甜心妹妹总是笑容满面，充满阳光活力。

translate.english: My sweet little sister is always beaming with smiles and full of sunny vitality.

examples.example: 我的甜心闺蜜总能给我最温暖的陪伴和支持。

translate.english: My sweet bestie can always give me the warmest companionship and support.
